[A] When a Climax Card is placed to your Climax Zone, choose up to 2 of your Characters, and for the turn they gain +500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 Character with either ::Master:: or ::Servant::, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a card in your Waiting Room and place it face-up under this as Marker.
[A] [(1)] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if there is not a Climax in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, you may choose a Climax under this as Marker and place it to the Climax Zone.
[A] When this attacks, if you have 4 other ::Master:: and/or ::Servant:: Characters, choose 1 of your Characters and for the turn that Character gains +2 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard 3 Characters with ::Master:: or ::Servant:: from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Excalibur" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains the following ability. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, you may deal 3 Damage to your Opponent 2 times." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When this card's Battle Opponent is Reversed, if "Battle of Determination" is in your Climax Zone, until the next end of your Opponent's turn this card gains following ability. "[A] When this is Front Attacked, you may choose another of your Characters and this and return them to hand."

[C] For each Marker under this, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose up to 3 "Gilgamesh, 8th Heroic Spirit" in your Waiting Room and place them underneath this face-down as Marker in any order.

[C] All of your other ::Master:: or :Servant:: Characters gain +1000 Power.
[S] [(2) Discard 4 Characters with ::Master:: and/or ::Servant:: from hand to the Waiting Room] For the turn this gains the following ability. "[C] If this is Standing in your Back Row, this card may be selected to attack. It then performs a Direct Attack."

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top 2 cards of your Library into the Waiting Room, and for the turn, this gains +X Power. X equals the number of ::Master:: and/or ::Servant:: placed in your Waiting Room by this effect times 1000.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose 1 of your "Sakura, Rain that Keeps Falling", and 1 of your "Emiya Family Key" in your Waiting Room, and placed them underneath this face-up as Marker. If you do, for the turn this gets +1 Soul.

[C] For each of your other Back Row Character with either ::Master:: or ::Servant::, this gains +500 Power.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[A] At the beginning of your Opponent's Draw, choose and perform one of the following two effects. "You may choose 1 of your Front Row Characters and place it in the Waiting Room. If so, for the turn all of your Characters gain +1500 Power." "You may choose 2 of your Front Row Characters and place them in the Waiting Room. If so, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +6000 Power."

[C] If you have no other Characters, this gains +1 Level and +1500 Power.
[A] When this attacks, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room. If there are any Climax cards among them, this gets -3000 Power for the turn.

[S] [(1) Discard an Event from your hand to the Waiting Room] Choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.
[S] [Rest 2 of your Characters] If this does not have a Marker under this, choose a "Jewel Sword Zelretch" in your Waiting Room and place it face-up underneath this as Marker.
[S] [Rest 2 of your Characters] Return a Marker from under this to your hand.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] CX COMBO When "Rule Breaker" is placed to your Climax Zone, choose a Trait on a Character on your Opponent's Stage, and for the turn all of your Opponent's Characters lose that Trait.

[Counter] If you do not have a ::Master:: or a ::Servant:: you cannot play this card from hand.
Put the top 4 cards of your Library into your Waiting Room, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +X Power. X equals the total number of Soul Trigger Icons on the cards placed in the Waiting Room by this effect times 2000.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.
[A] [(1)] During your Opponent's turn, when this becomes Reversed in Battle, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this, and at the start of your next Encore Step, put this in the Waiting Room.

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library into Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Master:: or ::Servant:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.
[A] When the Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, you may put this in your Stock.

[A] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Characters, and for the turn that Character gets -1000 Power.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other Characters with either ::Master:: or ::Servant::, Rest it, and move it to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[C] EXPERIENCE For each "Sakura, Moon Hidden by Clouds" or "Sakura, Flowing Tears" in your Level Zone this gains +1500 Power.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, put this on the bottom of the Library.

[A] CX COMBO When your Opponent Levels Up, if "Bellerophon" is in your Climax Zone, and this is in your Front Row, choose up to 1 ::Master:: or ::Servant:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it to Stock, and reveal the top card of your Library. If that card is a ::Master:: or ::Servant:: Character, put it in your hand. (otherwise put it back)

[C] EXPERIENCE If you have "Sakura, Moon Hidden by Clouds" and "Sakura, Flowing Tears" in your Level Zone, this gets -1 Level in hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO When '"Important Person" and "What You Want to Protect"' is placed to your Climax Zone, if this is in your Front Row, for the turn all of your Characters gain +1000 Power and the following ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may put the top card of your Library to Stock."

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Master:: or ::Servant:: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If is is a Character with ::Master:: or ::Servant::, for the turn this gains the following Ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may place that Character in Clock." [Put the revealed card back)

[A] [Place 2 of your other ::Servant:: Characters on Stage face-up underneath this as Marker in any order] At the beginning of your Opponent's Encore Step, you may pay cost. If you do not, put this into your Waiting Room.
[A] At the beginning of your Opponent's Climax Phase, if this has 7 or more Markers under it, put this in the Waiting Room, choose up to 1 "Sakura, Jealous" in your Waiting Room, place it in the Slot this was in, and for the turn all of your Opponent's Characters get -3000 Power.
[S] [Put another of your "Shinji, Enraged" from Stage to your Waiting Room] Look at the top card of your Library and place it face-up underneath this as Marker.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a "Emiya Family's Master Key" in your Waiting Room and put it face-up under this as Marker.
[A] [(1) Put a Marker from underneath this to the Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, move this to an empty Slot in your Back Row.
[A] At the start of your Draw Phase, if you have no other Characters in the Front Row, this gains +4000 Power for the turn.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters with ::Master:: or ::Servant:: in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest 2 of your Characters] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 from among them, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room."

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a Character with either ::Master:: and/or ::Servant::, place it in your hand, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise place the card back where it was)
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from the hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, that character gains the following ability. "[C] This cannot move to another Slot."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, Choose a Trait on an Opponent's Character on Stage, and for the turn all of your Opponent's Characters lose that Trait.

[A] [(1) Discard a ::Master:: or ::Servant:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room, put this into Clock] When this card is Reversed in Battle, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 2 cards named "Sakura, Overflowing Words" and/or "Rider, Intruder", show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If you have no other Characters, this gains +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] During your turn, when the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
--None--

[C] If there are 5 or more cards in your Stock, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if this is Standing and you have 1 or less other Character in your Front Row, you may put up to 1 card from the top of your Library to Stock, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains the following ability. "[A] When this is Front Attacked, you may return it to hand."

[A] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if this is Standing and you have 1 or less other Character in your Front Row, you may put up to 1 card from the top of your Library to Stock, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains the following ability. "[A] When this is Front Attacked, you may return it to hand."

X equals the total of the Levels of the cards placed in the Waiting Room by this ability. (Climax cards are considered Level 0)

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw up to 2 cards, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

If so, put the bottom 6 cards of your Opponent's Library into their Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the number of Climax Cards put into the Waiting Room in this way. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] If there are 5 or fewer cards in your hand, this gains +1500 Power.
